item.title: Holiday Travel Boom: Over 122 Million Americans Set To Travel During Christmas And New Year Amid Cheaper Gas, Pricier Flights
item.description: Record-breaking holiday travel season expected as gas prices drop and air ticket prices increase amid CAFE standards relaxation by Trump. read more

item.title: Rivian Builds AI Assistant To Run The Vehicle, Not Just Talk
item.description: Rivian (RIVN) develops own AI assistant, separate from VW joint venture. Built in-house, integrates with vehicle controls. read more

item.title: Howard Marks Weighs In On AI Frenzy: Don't Go All-In Or All-Out Amid Debt-Funded 'Winner-Take-All' Risks
item.description: Howard Marks labels AI a bubble but warns against exiting. Read why he flags debt financing as the major risk in his latest Oaktree memo. read more
